Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are excited to announce Ian Penny, Chief Information Officer (CIO) of Hiscox and the former Chief Technology Officer (CTO) of Barclays, has been elected to Turbonomic's Board of Directors. Penny is the second Turbonomic board member with CIO experience in driving major digital transformation and cloud initiatives for international multi-billion dollar companies.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/press-releases/hiscox-cio-joins-turbonomic-board-of-directors/]]>
Over 2,000 CIOs and 20 percent of the Fortune 500 trust Turbonomic to manage over 3.5 million dynamic workloads in real-time, assuring application performance and enforcing policy compliance while reducing costs, on-premises and in the cloud.
Interested in taking a closer look? Check out our 30-day free trial to see Turbonomic for yourself <[[https://turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4hHAAQ]]>.
Best, Andrew
